thumb.name: Baby Snowman
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3E4 by 8 Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Double click on the Add-a-Photo message (within the workspace) to add your digital photo.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E4. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3EFor Borderless Designs:%3C/b%3E Click on the Print button, click the Preferences button, and within your specific printer driver, find and check the Borderless Printing option. (Note: not all printers support borderless printing. See %3Ca href='#' onclick='Help(0);' %3EHelp%3C/a%3E for details).%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your cards on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

See %3Ca href='#' onclick='Help(0);' %3EHelp%3C/a%3E for details).%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your cards on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

thumb.name: All My Love
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3E4 by 8 Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Double click on the Add-a-Photo message (within the workspace) to add your digital photo.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E4. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3EFor Borderless Designs:%3C/b%3E Click on the Print button, click the Preferences button, and within your specific printer driver, find and check the Borderless Printing option. (Note: not all printers support borderless printing. See %3Ca href='#' onclick='Help(0);' %3EHelp%3C/a%3E for details).%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your cards on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E
